tool_description: Analyzes joke text and adds timing markers, pause indicators, and delivery cues for optimal comedic timing.

joke_text.description: Complete joke text to optimize for timing

delivery_style.description: Performance style: standup, conversational, theatrical, or deadpan

pace_preference.description: Overall pacing: slow, medium, or fast

audience_size.description: Expected audience size: intimate, medium, or large

include_gestures.description: Whether to include gesture timing cues

error_messages: Empty joke text: Provide joke text to optimize timing for.
Invalid delivery style: Choose from standup, conversational, theatrical, or deadpan.
Invalid pace preference: Choose from slow, medium, or fast.
Invalid audience size: Choose from intimate, medium, or large.
Joke too short: Joke must be at least 15 characters for timing analysis.
usage: Input your complete joke text and specify delivery style, pacing, and audience context to get optimized timing markers.

timed_text.description: Joke text with timing markers and pause indicators

pause_locations.description: Character positions where pauses should occur

emphasis_points.description: Words or phrases that should be emphasized

rhythm_pattern.description: Description of the recommended rhythm pattern
